constraints.base¶

Defines basic constraint objects.

class BaseConstraints[source]¶

Abstract base class for constraints.

check(val, **ctx)[source]¶

Check argument for constraints within a context.

Parameters:
  • val – The value to check.
  • ctx – The context to run the check in, for example, this might include a database session.
Returns:

An non-trivial Error object when the argument does not satisfy the constraints, or Error() when it does.
Return type:

An Error object.
class Dict(**fields)[source]¶

Composite constraint on a Python dict.

class Generic(code, pred)[source]¶

Generic constraint from a predicate.

Create a generic constraint.

Parameters:
  • code – On error, the constraint returns Error(code).
  • pred – The predicate to check for.
InstanceOf(cls)[source]¶

Create generic constraint on the type of the value.

MaxSize(n)[source]¶

Create generic constraint on the length of the value.
